name: startup
description: ## Elevator Pitch    As technology sprints into the future, many old knoledge gets left behing and forgotten. Much knowledge never even got the chance to be read. With <ins>Codex Vivit</ins>* we offer a place, using the latest in web technology to find, learn about, and study from antiquarian and rare codecies. Keeping old knowledge alive will give the future a grounding in the past and inspire the next generation.
